title: Challenger Ahri
body: I have recently taken a liking to Ahri and would like to know if this skin will be coming back soon. I read on another forum that it will be coming back at the start of next season but I do not know if this is true. Will Challenger Ahri come back soon?

replies.body:
Hey Cheekoneco1,

Challenger Ahri is legacy, which means she will make a return to the shop. We haven't announced dates for her return, though.
